item.title: US applications for jobless benefits rise last week, but layoffs remain historically low
item.description: More Americans filed for unemployment benefits last week, but U.S. layoffs remain in the same historically healthy range of the past few years

item.title: Students face new cellphone restrictions in 17 states as school year begins
item.description: As students start school this year, 17 states and the District of Columbia are imposing new cellphone restrictions

item.title: Reporter says former aide to New York City Mayor Eric Adams gave her a chip bag filled with cash
item.description: A New York City reporter says a former aide to Mayor Eric Adams gave her a potato chip bag filled with cash following a campaign event
